column6: A two-floor town home about 5-10 minutes from ATT Stadium. Located near restaurants and bars (such as Lincoln Square). Please let me know if you are bringing a fourth guest and I'll place an air mattress on the second floor. Coffee, wifi, tv, washer, dryer, and essentials are included. There are two spots for parking outside. \n\nEnjoy your stay! I'll be available for any support!
column9: Renovated two story town home close to ATT Stadium
